name: YOSH: Your Own Super Hopper
description:
Navigate the sticky levels by hopping from one surface to another, but watch out for the traps and enemies who are ready to kill you!

More details are available on the Kickstarter project here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bfarrant/your...
There is also an alpha demo that you can download and play before you decide if you like the game!

Please donate if you like the idea of the game!

The game is due to be released in August 2015, but will be on Greenlight in April, and beta access in May!

Enjoy! :-)
